root.name: Escape Goat
root.description: OverviewEscape Goat is a puzzle-platformer for XBLA and PC; to progress, the player must find keys to unlock the exit door in order to complete each level. Obstacles require the player to manipulate the environment with the aid of a mouse companion and use physics to thwart foes. The game includes a level editor for sharing custom campaigns.The game's music was mixed mastered by Chainsaw.System RequirementsPCMinimumOS: Windows XP Service Pack 3Processor: Dual Core CPUMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video cardDirectX: Version 9.0cHard Drive: 100 MB available spaceMacMinimumOS: Snow Leopard 10.6.8Processor: Dual Core CPUMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)Hard Drive: 100 MB available spaceLinuxMinimumOS: glibc 2.15+, 32/64-bit. S3TC support is NOT required.Processor: Dual core CPUMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
